AI Description: r-base64 is an R package that provides functions for encoding and decoding base64 data in R language. Base64 is a binary-to-text encoding scheme that converts binary data into ASCII strings using a set of 64 printable characters.
Core Features: Encode Binary Data Into Base64 Format, Decode Base64 Strings Back To Binary Data, Support For Efficient & Secure Data Encoding & Decoding, Integration With R Environment For Seamless Data Manipulation
General Tags: Base64 Encoding, Data Encoding, R Package, Binary-To-Text Conversion
